description: Try our easy to follow Lemongrass & Chilli Salmon Skewers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Lemongrass & Chilli Salmon Skewers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs coriander leaves, finely chopped (plus extra leaves for garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Place salmon, lemongrass, ginger, sauce, 1 tsp sesame oil and 1 tsp salt in a food processor. Pulse until finely chopped, but not a paste. Transfer to a bowl, add chilli and chopped coriander, and mix to combine.

Using about 2 1/2 tbs of mixture, form onto a skewer, pressing firmly with your hand. Place on a baking paper-lined tray. Repeat to make 15 more skewers. Freeze for 10 minutes until firm then brush with remaining sesame oil.

Heat 2 tsp vegetable oil in a large non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat. Add half the skewers and cook for 5 minutes, turning carefully with a spatula, or until golden and cooked through. Repeat with remaining oil and skewers.
Serve salmon skewers scattered with coriander leaves and lime.
